thread.title: The best gentle exercise videos that you can do from home
thread.title_full: The best gentle exercise videos that you can do from home

author: Eleanor Doughty
title: The best gentle exercise videos that you can do from home
text:
Advertisement The best gentle exercise videos that you can do from home Getting your trainers on doesn't mean going to the gym every day. You can do plenty of exercise from home with these easy fitness videos Make like Jane Fonda with some workouts from home Photo: Jane Fonda/PhotoFest Follow 
If you're looking for a little bit of exercise to liven up your day - because, as we know, you should be doing a little bit every day - then look no further. 
These are the exercise routines that you can do from home . They're as gentle as you want to make them, and all you need is a good (enough) internet connection and something comfy to wear. 
You're welcome. Jane Fonda 
Jane Fonda is the queen of the good fun workout. So retro, so cool - so, well, Fonda. 
Her workout Fit & Strong is designed to boost your metabolism and get you up and about and moving - it's energetic enough without being too tiring. Just right. Rosemary Conley 
This 10-minute workout by Rosemary Conley's fitness consultant Mary Morris delivers a dash of energy in a short cardio workout that doesn't load up strain on your joints and bones. 
Best of all, it can all be done from a chair. EHowFitness 
EHow are masters of the 'how to' video, and they've even got the fitness box ticked. 
These short spurts of video will give you every bit of advice about which exercises to do to help different parts of your body, and there's so many of them that you'll simply never run out! A joy. The Mat Project 
A gentle yoga class, perfect for those that want to take it steady. Whether you're feeling a bit creaky, or you haven't given it a go for a while, this is the half hour of yoga you've been missing. 
As they say, all you need is a mat. Fitness with Paula 
All that enthusiastic Paula is missing is a soundtrack of her own, but she makes up for it in hip, hop and happening exercises that are designed to give you a good, fun workout. 
Simply find your favourite track at home and get pumping. Gently. Sit Stand and Move 
If you're after 45 minutes of stretching and moving with a chair then you've come to the right place with Ronnie Jordan's easy exercises. 
A little march here, a little sit down there and you're all ready to get fit. Easy peasy.
